title: vAvenruDanE
sahitya:
vAvenruDanE kUvik-koLLuvAi manam kaDanda dinakarEshA


anupallavi

  kAvAi enru kangulellAm kaNNIr viTTuk-kadari ninrEn


caraNam    japa tapa vratangaL kAttum sAttirangaL kaTrum kETTum
sariyai giriyai yOga jnAna sAdhanangaL sheidum ennE
abhayam aLikkum ayyanE nin anbil uyirkkum AnmA ennai
